entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lutselke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:32 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -32.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lutselke Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -32.3°C

Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -36.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
